{"id":672138843,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1648892707,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/672138843/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool helper(string &s, int i, int j, int flag)\n    {\n        if(flag > 1)\n            return false;\n        \n        while(i < j)\n        {\n            if(s[i] == s[j])\n                return helper(s, i + 1, j - 1, flag);\n            \n            else\n                return helper(s, i + 1, j, flag + 1) || helper(s, i, j - 1, flag + 1);\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int i = 0, j = s.length() - 1;\n        return helper(s, i, j, 0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
